name: simplesvg-sprites
description: A Node app to create an SVG sprite sheet from SimpleIcons.

scripts.start: cd ./public/scripts && mkdir libs && cd ../.. && cp ./node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js ./public/scripts/libs && cp ./node_modules/vue/dist/vue.min.js ./public/scripts/libs && node server
scripts.stop: node server.stop && echo "Server process is exiting" && exit 0

author: foo-dogsquared
